author: matz-e
body:
Factor out headers for the (un)packing of the L1T and seal the modules in the plugins directory. Allows other packages to depend on L1TRawToDigi as a library, as needed for DQM.

Backport of #15387. Fixes cms-l1t-offline/cmssw#398.
title: "Seal" L1T unpacking plugin declarations (backport to 80X).
